content.question: In your response, be sure to address all parts of the question. Use complete sentences; an outline or bulleted list alone is not acceptable.Answer (a), (b), and (c). Confine your response to the period from 1607 to 1754.Briefly describe one difference between the economy of British North American colonies in the Chesapeake region (such as Virginia and Maryland) and the economy of the middle colonies (such as Pennsylvania and New York).Briefly describe one similarity between the economy of the Chesapeake colonies and the economy of the middle colonies.Briefly explain one reason for a difference between the economy of the Chesapeake colonies and the economy of the middle colonies.

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
